script.name: al.Anarkis.Pirate.Tick
script.description: Pirate Guild - AL Plugin - Main Timer Routine

line.comment: * Global AL loop handling the Pirate Guild plugin
* Fix 2: Max amount of bounter hunters = number of pirate bases
* Fix 3: Correct issue with a 3rd party plugin

* Idea: On higher difficulty levels, chance of a large scale assault on a player owned station or huge ship or playership itself, using combined forces of multiple bases and frigates (with or without warning)

* For some weird reason, al timer loops sometimes run more than once, even if the time interval is set to longer time period. To prevent this behaviour, this flag is raised as long as the loop is running
* Check to see if we have a new target race

line.text: '* PG AL LOOP BEGIN, process ID: %s Pirate Bases ingame: %s Guild money: %s Target race: %s'

line.comment: * Check stations and promote to Guild if needed
* - Fix 3 : Correct issue with a 3rd party plugin
* Respawn Pirate Shipyards, if any needed
* Look for the Mobile HQ and randomly spawn one if none found

line.text: 'A new Guild Mobile HQ (%s) has been spawned in sector %s'

line.comment: * Check if Player is Guild Member and Notoriety still high enough to remain member
* Fix 2 : Max amount of bounter hunters = number of pirate bases
* Debug output (good for checking, if a new loop is started before the old one has ended)

line.text: '* PG AL LOOP END, process ID: %s'

sval.val: Pirate Guild - AL Plugin - Main Timer Routine
* PG AL LOOP BEGIN, process ID: %s Pirate Bases ingame: %s Guild money: %s Target race: %s
A new Guild Mobile HQ (%s) has been spawned in sector %s
* PG AL LOOP END, process ID: %s
Global AL loop handling the Pirate Guild plugin
Fix 1: Ignore invincible (plot) PB
Fix 2: Max amount of bounter hunters = number of pirate bases
Fix 3: Correct issue with a 3rd party plugin
Added (Nicoman35): mutex

Idea: On higher difficulty levels, chance of a large scale assault on a player owned station or huge ship or playership itself, using combined forces of multiple bases and frigates (with or without warning)
Difficulty: 0=Very low 1=Low 2=Medium 3=Strong 4=Very strong 5=Insane

For some weird reason, al timer loops sometimes run more than once, even if the time interval is set to longer time period. To prevent this behaviour, this flag is raised as long as the loop is running
Check to see if we have a new target race
Debug output
Check stations and promote to Guild if needed
- Fix 1 : Ignore invincible (plot) PB
- Fix 3 : Correct issue with a 3rd party plugin
Respawn Pirate Shipyards, if any needed
= [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.Gen.Anarkis.Pirate.Respawn.SY' :
Look for the Mobile HQ and randomly spawn one if none found
Debug output
Buy M7 Frigate, if possible
Buy the M2, if possible
Check if Player is Guild Member and Notoriety still high enough to remain member
Spawn a new police TL
Spawn a new prison TM
Spawn a new bounty hunter
Fix 2 : Max amount of bounter hunters = number of pirate bases
Add a random news
Debug output (good for checking, if a new loop is started before the old one has ended)
Lower loop running flag
